attributes.action: Force BA Cabin staff back to work and ensure a happy Christmas for thousands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has an obligation to ensure that Christmas isn't ruined by BA Cabin staff on strike!

It simply is not acceptable for the Union members to cause so much disruption and ruined holidays which people have spent their hard earnt money on. 

I urge the Prime Minister to intervene and call a halt to the strike with immediate effect. The government will then assist in the mediation between the two conflicting parties involved. Further more the Prime Minister and his government should take action to ensure that the operations of our flag carrier are not disrupted in the future.

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
